ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains EISCAT common program CP3 auto-correlation functions (ACF) from the ESR (32 m ) Steerable Antenna.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Antenna Azimuth
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Azimuth (0, North)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Antenna Elevation
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Antenna Elevation (90, Vertical)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Half Scattering Angle
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Half Scattering Angle (0, 90째)

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Transmit Peak Power
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Transmit Peak Power

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Number of Sample Summed
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Number of Sample Summed - Increment
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: Number of Sample Summed - Increment

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  System Temperature
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Single Value Parameters - Values: System Temperature

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Line Of Sight Velocity
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity (for monostatic radar) or velocity along the Transmit/Receive direction bisector

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Line Of Sight Velocity Error
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter Line Of Sight Velocity Error

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Doppler Frequency Measured
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter Doppler Frequency Measured

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Raw Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter Decimal Logarithm of the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Name: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter  Decimal Logarithm of the Error on the Electron Densities
Parameter.Caveats:
The Logaritm is applied on the scaled valued. 
Scale : 1.e^-3

Parameter.Description: EISCAT CP3 ACF ESR Steerable Antenna  Primary Parameter Electron Temperature
